name: The Snake's Taken a Spouse
description:
Warning: 18+ but 18+ content can be turned off when starting game, contains a yandere character along with kidnapping, screen shakes and flashes, and some violence.
More content and trigger warning details below

A walk in the forest is exactly what some need to relax, but you get more than you bargained for when you save a snake boy and he says he wants to marry you??

Will you try to escape at all costs? Try to figure out what's going on with him or what he is? Or maybe even give him a chance?

It's all up to you.

Specific Warnings:

  • Somewhat possessive character
  • Kidnapping
  • Screenshakes and flashing images
  • Some violence, gore, and death (blood in one ending, death of a non-player character in two endings)
  • Death of small animal(s) (not shown)
  • Gun (audio and implied use)
  • Nonconsensual NSFW*
  • Implied somnophilia*

* if the “All nsfw” option is picked at the start of a game

Made in 5 weeks and 2 days for the 2023 Yan Jam

Includes:

6 Endings
2 in game days
Being able to choose if you'd like SFW, only consensual NSFW, or all NSFW at the start of a game 
Choosing the player character's name and pronouns 

Credits:

Coding: Me

Sprite, CG, and main menu art: me

Background art and miscellaneous art: KlearPaquer

Sound effects: Pixabay

Music: Pixabay and me

You can find me at gamesofcrimsin on tumblr
